title: Night and Day - the passage is best described as

content.question: Taken as a whole, the passage is best described as

choices.label: a study of a flaw in character
an explanation for a puzzling behavior
an homage to a bygone era
an account of a gradual realization

content.answer: an account of a gradual realization

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
